start_message:
🤖 Hello, I'm Aurora neural network 👱‍♀️ Smart bot for creating, editing, animating images, and even creating music to your taste! What I can do:
- Create pictures based on your request 🩵
- Modify your photos and pictures 💚
- Create music 🎧
- Animate any image 🤯
- Improve image quality 🔮
- Translate videos into any language📹
❗️️ Important
We recommend you write a more accurate description for creating a musical work or changing your picture to get a better result
/help - help
start_message_for_new_users:
Hello!, {name}! Want to get the same result? 🤖 Hello, I'm Aurora neural network 👱‍♀️ Smart bot for creating, editing, animating images, and even creating music to your taste! What I can do:
- Create pictures based on your request 🩵
- Modify your photos and pictures 💚
- Create music 🎧
- Animate any image 🤯
- Improve image quality 🔮
❗️ Important
We recommend you write a more accurate description for creating a musical work or changing your picture to get a better result
/help - help Try uploading any image and specifying what you need 📸 Good luck creating something beautiful 🎉📸🌟 /start - start /buy - purchase generations You have 3 generations available
error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
help_message:
📄 Guide: You need to upload an image, write a request, and wait for the result 🩻 Your personal account - /account The following steps:
1️⃣ Step: Click - Start
2️⃣ Step: Upload an image or write a text request
3️⃣ Step: Write a request for editing
4️⃣ Step: Wait for the neural network to generate the image.
❗️Important: Image generation takes more than 20 seconds
not_sub_message: You need to subscribe to our channel (TELEGRAM_CHANEL_URL) to use the bot.
buy_message: Choose the payment plan you want to purchase:
not_available_generations_message: You do not have any available generations
what_do_you_want: What do you want to do?
successful_payment:
✅ Subscription is made until: 
{date}
/start - start Successful generation 📸🎉!
generation_music_lyric:
🎵Now add your wishes in sound🎵 For example: heavy rock, male voice
For better match your expectations describe the genre of the song, its mood, what instruments are playing
❗️️Try not to use specific artists and their songs in your request
generate_music_message: 'Your request has been received, the song is being generated, please wait. It may take some time.
generate_music_second_message: We will now send a second option, while you wait, you can listen to the first one🎧
generate_music_error_message:
Your track is so cool 🤟 that Aurora neural network went into hibernation 😔
Try generating again 😜
generation_prompt_message:
1️⃣ Write your prompt (hint) for image generation: Tip:
Describe in detail what should be depicted.
music_creation_message:
1️⃣ Great, send the lyrics of your song🎶: Tip:
Tip: if you want a longer track, your lyrics shouldn't be very short
❗️Important:
If you want a song with repeating lines, duplicate them in the right places
failed_to_generate_request: Unfortunately, the bot was unable to generate your request.
start_of_creation:
Request received! I'm starting to create!

Wait a bit, it will take some time!
prompt_error: You must give a prompt for the image generator
generation_image_message:
1️⃣ Send an image: Tip:
Available formats: png, jpg, jpeg or webp
❗️Important:
I can't create images with 2 or more people
generation_image_get_image_message:
2️⃣ Step: Describe in detail what you want to get in the picture Tip:
Describe in detail what should be depicted.
error_invoice:
❌ Payment system error.
Try a different payment option
